"parisara sanrakshanaya kriyawaliya pilibandawa janamadhyawedin sandaha wana warshika wadamuluwa" themawa lesa ganimin pawathi mema wadamuluwa parisara amathya anura priyadarshana yapa saha madhyama parisara adhikariye sabhapathi charitha herath mahathwarunge pradhanathwayen saha madhyama parisara adhikariye parisara adhyapana saha danuwath kirim niyojya adhyaksha jayawilal pranandu, adhyaksha janaral ramani allepola, pasu bhawitha plastik apadrawya kalamanakarana jathika wyapruthiye adhyaksha bandhula sarath kumara yana mahathma mahathminge sahabhagithwayen sidukerunu athara, aramunu pahadili karamin katha kala jayawilal pranandu mahatha kiya sitiye parisara sanrakshanaya ha ghana apadrawya kalamanakaranaya pilibandawa madhyawedin danuwath wima magin mahajanathawa danuwath kirima mema wadamuluwe pradhana aramuna bawayi.

(mata dan penawa meka balala ohu hari apuruwata hinawena gaman mata neddakin kiyala banina hatith..)meyata tika dinakata ihathadi ma wisin blogayata liyana lada lipiyak dutu thawath sinhala blog athara saranna wu apa danna kiyana thanaththiyak wisin ehi ma sandahan kala mage punchi aasawak pilibandawa satahanata awadhanaya yomu kara ee sandaha yam deyak thamata kala haki bawa danwa siti athara ee haraha ma hata labennata uruma wuye mage sayibar jiwithaya thuladi ma labanna wu thawath apuruthama thilinayaki..aththenma ehidi warin wara ma wetha paniwida ewamin aya wisin ma hata ema thilinaya laba dima wenuwen boho se apa kapa wi katayuthu karanu labiya...ehi awasana prathipalaya se ada dina ma hata kolambaa wishwa widyalayata paya gasimata sidu wu athara maha wassa madama themigena ehi gos ema thilinaya ma athata laba gannata mata haki wini...thilinaya pamanak nowa jiwithaye palamu warata wishwawidyala bhumiyakata paya gahannatada mata ee haraha ada wasanawa uda wu athara wanka giriyak bandu wu wishwa widyala goda nagilla nirmanaya kala aya ho ayawalun nam sahenna magen banum asa gath bawada kiwa yuthumaya...bohoma amaruwen atharaman nowi andala thanin mata ewa thibu thilinaya ma atha path wu pasuwa thawath honda warusawak madama yanthamin ada dahawal wana wita gedarata aapasu eemata haki wu athara..eyin pasu thyagaya piriksa balana wita ekak wenuwata thunakma labi thibuni...dan me wana wita nam eyin ekak itha siru maruwata payakata aasanna kalayak laba gena ma wisin hamara karannata yeduna athara...eyin ma lada windanaya imahath bawath...ema windanayatath wada thilinayak eya himi wu nisa labana sathuta haraha ma wisin bhukthi windina bawada mehi satahan karannata kamaththemi...aruni akke obata sthuthiyi..!
